snippet: Congress can help American business and send a human rights message to Russia by passing a trade bill.
abstract: Editorial urges Congress to pass Russian trade bill before the August recess; warns that if the Jackson-Vanik amendment, enacted in 1974 to pressure Moscow to grant Jews the freedom to leave the country by effectively imposing higher tariffs on imports from the Soviet Union, is not lifted the US will be in violation of World Trade Organization rules and American exporters will suffer.
lead_paragraph: Congress can help American business and send a human rights message to Russia by passing a trade bill.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
